description: This is an HTML file implementing the front-end for a database visualizer UI, including CSS styles and JavaScript functions for fetching and displaying database, table, and data information in an interactive web page.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Fetches the list of databases and updates the UI.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Refreshes the list of databases, resets states, and reloads the data.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Handles the expansion or collapse of database's table list.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Fetches and displays tables for a selected database.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Fetches and displays data records for a selected table.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Renders the data into an HTML table and adds scroll hints if needed.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Generates HTML for individual cell content based on data type and length.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Expands or collapses a cell to show more or less content.
